settings.content: Need Help With Your Proven Profitable Theme?

We are here to help! Please [contact us](https://support.rapidcrush.com/anonymous_requests/new?ticket%5Bfields%5D%5B20569956%5D=onestopshop) if you have any questions or need help with your Proven Profitable Theme.

settings.label: Select Logo
settings.info: For the best results upload a logo no wider than 235px and no taller than 110px.

settings.label: Favorite Icon
settings.info: Uploading an image to use as your site's favicon. Ideally 32px x 32px

settings.label: Use Wide Layout
settings.info: Changes max-width of site layout to 1300px (default is 950px).

settings.content: Social Media Accounts - Enter in full url eg: http://www.facebook.com/name.

settings.label: Store Slogan
settings.info: Wrap words in tag to bold words. Max 50 character length.

settings.label: Main Nav CTA Text
settings.info: Max 25 character length.

settings.label: Bold Main Nav CTA Text
settings.info: If you do not want all of the text bold do not check this and wrap words in tag to bold words.

settings.label: Main Nav CTA JavaScript
settings.info: You must include <script> tags.

settings.label: Header Code Injection
settings.info: This is to add any additional code right before the closing </head> tag on all pages. You must include proper HTML and/or script tags.
Setup your Promo this section is located in the Header between the search and phone number.

settings.label: Promo Link
settings.info: If used will wrap the content in a link.

settings.label: Promo Content
settings.info: Will Be Red
Define social media accounts under the "Branding" section. For best results upload images 25px wide by 25px tall.
The logo specified in the Branding Theme settings will be used here.

settings.label: Tagline
settings.info: This will be displayed right below the logo.

settings.label: Tagline 2
settings.info: This will be displayed right below Tagline.

settings.label: Body Code Injection
settings.info: This is to add any additional code right before the closing </body> tag on all pages. You must include proper HTML and/or script tags.
Setup your Promo this section is located at the top of the Footer and right above the Footer Videos section. For best results use square images.
Setup your Videso this section is located in the footer of your theme right above the Footer Testimonials and riight below Footer Promo.
Setup your testimonials this section is located in the footer of your theme right above the Footer Image Gallery and riight below Footer Videos.
Setup your image gallery this section is located in the footer of your theme.
Setup a slideshow of featured press images in the footer of your theme.
Setup your CTA this section is located in the footer of your theme right below the Footer Image Gallery. The primary color you have chosen will be used for the background color of this section.

settings.label: Unique Selling Propisition
settings.info: Wrap words in <strong/> tag to bold words.

settings.label: Footer Call To Action
settings.info: Wrap words in <strong/> tag to bold words.

settings.label: CTA Button Text
settings.info: Wrap words in <strong/> tag to bold words.
Setup your Brand Logos this section is located in the footer of your theme right below the Footer CTA. For best results upload images with transparent backgrounds (.gifs or .pngs).

settings.label: Select Page
settings.info: This will show the content from the selected page under the main banner.

settings.info: This will show the content from the selected page under trio advertisement block.
The following settings are for the collection template with a sidebar.

settings.label: Top Sidebar Image
settings.info: This is the banner to be displayed at the top of the sidebar. For the best results upload an image 179px wide.

settings.label: Bottom Sidebar Image
settings.info: This is the banner to be displayed at the top of the sidebar. For the best results upload an image 179px wide.
Notice: Tags used for filtering are case sensitive.

settings.label: Price filtering ranges
settings.info: Separate each tag with a comma. You must also appropriately add these to your product as tags.

settings.label: Generic filtering options
settings.info: Separate each tag with a comma. You must also appropriately add these to your product as tags.

settings.label: Generic filtering options 2
settings.info: Seperate each tag with a comma. You must also appropriately add these to your product as tags.

settings.label: Generic filtering options 3
settings.info: Seperate each tag with a comma. You must also appropriately add these to your product as tags.

settings.label: Use Stackable Filters
settings.info: With this option you can filter your collections by multiple filters simultaneously. Recommended for stores with many products. To use this option products' 'type' and 'vendor' must be added as tags to that product in addition to being selected as type and vendor. A product should not have a tag that is a type or vendor on your store that is not it's type or vendor.

settings.label: Banner Image For collection.wide template
settings.info: This is the banner to be displayed at the top of the page, above the store items on the collection.wide template. Image should be approximately 940px wide.

settings.label: Add To Cart Banner
settings.info: This is the banner to be displayed under the add to cart button. For the best results upload an image 329px wide by 89px tall

settings.label: Use second 'add to cart' button at bottom of product page
